scheme_name: Mukhya Mantri Himachal Health Care Scheme-HIMCARE
description: The HIMCARE scheme provides cashless health care coverage of up to Rs. 5 lakh per year per family for hospitalization in empanelled hospitals.
key_features: Cashless treatment up to Rs. 5 lakh per family per year
Covers 5 members per family (3 children + parents)

benefits.coverage_amount: Up to Rs. 5 Lakh per family per year

criteria: Families not covered under Ayushman Bharat
Specific groups like street vendors, daily wagers, and out-sourced workers

steps: Apply through HIMCARE portal or Common Service Centres
Pay premium (Rs. 1000 for general, Rs. 500 for specific categories)

special_notes: Premium waivers for certain categories like BPL families
